name: Buildman
description:
Concept

A physics puzzle game mashed up with level editor platformers ("Mario Maker" style). Travel through this construction site as you manouver blocks and beams to build your way through the levels. Use your platforming and spacial reasoning skills to solve the puzzles, minding your budget as well.

Gameplay

To complete the levels 100%, go for the 3 stars of completion:

  • 1st Star - Level finished
  • 2nd Star - Got coin
  • 3rd Star - Lowest budget possible (considering the coin grab)
Controls

A/D - Move Left/Right

Space/W - Jump

Left Click - Build 

Right Click - Refund

R - Rotate

Have fun!

Track: "Airship Serenity" - Kevin MacLeod

Made for Mini Jam #71 - Puzzles
